body.p: I thought the enclosed cutting out, of my Chester paper would interest you. So I have taken the liberty to send it.

Your kindness on the field of battle, and
in the hospitals, is deserving of all praise—and is appreciated by all Britons.

Being a stranger, not having read much of your poetry, I am very anxious, if possible, to procure, a copy of the first edition of one of your earliest poems—I am not particular which one—if you would kindly advise me where
I could procure a copy—I am sure Sir, you have the best wishes of myself, and all—for your health and happiness + wishing you a joyful Xmas + a happy new year.

postscript.p: It must have been a great consolation to you, to think that you have helped so much to alleviate the sufferings of those on the field of battle, and in the hospitals.
